评论详情: Not bad fabric and make for a relatively cheap dress.  I wear a small in anything but got a medium in this and it fit perfect.  It's long so had to wear 6 inch heels with it (I'm 5'6).  Comfortable and stretchy and worked perfect for my Deloris costume for Halloween.

absolutely amazing. the quality is nice but a little thin. chest portion is a little big but that’s on means i should have sized down. but yeah i absolutely love this dress and i’m constantly wearing it!! 🖤
Fits true to size, is a little thin for material, but not see through. Very happy with the product.
Super cute bought for my granddaughter well made
